title: RIOT!I need 30 riot points please!
body: I'm trying to buy nighthunter rengar(975)but i currently have 945 :( .I am 30 rp short.:({{champion:107}}

replies.body:
No. No. No. It does not work out like this.

You have to pay a tribute to Rito by expressing your illustrative arts reflecting the wealth for which you are asking RP, and attach it to the tiked; preferiably sharing it on boards.
It' s not mandatory, but is tradition!
Send us a [Player Support request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), my friend. No promises, but we do like to help in these cases!
